description:
The Beast of Darkness is the manifestation of http://anidb.net/character/650 [Guts]` wrath and bloodlust, born from the trauma of his experiences during the Eclipse and his intense vindictiveness towards demonkind. As an amalgamation of the swordsman`s malice, it relentlessly attempts to overtake his mind. Whenever Guts dons the Berserker Armor, the Beast takes physical form through the fetish, granting him unnatural strength and ferocity.
Berserk Wiki
name: Yami no Kemono
